name: Neutrino
description:
Neutrino is a minimalist pong-like game with very simple mechanics.



You rotate the aim, click to launch and if you are fast enough to change your mind, reset back try it again!



                    13 levels, each with 10 different rooms - total to 130 puzzles!



Difficulty evolves and new types of challenges are introduced gradually as you evolve further in the game, and if you're good enough o win level 12, you get the final boss to face to and finally escape the black hole!

Controls


You can use Mouse, Keyboard in 2 ways and PS4 Dual Shock, as you wish.

Thank you for playing Neutrino!
